title: The Mime of Marcel Marceau
creator_credit: Daniel Camus and Learning Corporation of America
brief_description: Scenes from various classes conducted by Marcel Marceau and the teachers of his school are intercut with actual performances including “The Maskmaker”, “The Painter” and “The Creation”. Looks at the work of Marcel Marceau, both private and public. it is in the private domain that we see the “other” side of him - that is to say, his everyday reality of teaching mime.
